price: Rahmata Gooftaa kee irraa ta’eef (buufne). Inni Isumatu dhaga’aa, beekaadha.
arabic: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: raḥmatan min rabbika innahu huwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
